Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class ResourceCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.ResourceCard
public class ResourceCard extends PlayableCard
A resource card is a playable card that doesn't require any resources to be placed on the board. Some resource cards can give points when played on the front side.
